thread.section_title: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very enjoyable stay
thread.title_full: Very enjoyable stay - Review of Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Susan K D
title: Very enjoyable stay
text:
We loved this hotel and it's location, not too far to walk to the Eiffel Tower and shops. There is a supermarket just a stones throw away and on the corner not far from the hotel is a very pleasant bar.
Our room (603) was very comfortable and a good size. It has a balcony and good views of the Seine.
There was plenty of choice for breakfast.
The staff are lovely, very pleasant, and nothing was too much trouble to them.
We will stay here when we visit Paris at any time in the future.
